about_the_game:
SKYRAID is a 6 vs 6 online mulitplayer game of conquest. Engage in high speed aerial combat like you've never experienced it before, with a top-down camera angle, skill-based movement and combat mechanics, advanced guided weaponry and emergency countermeasures. Escort airborne forces deep into enemy territory to destroy emplacements, ships, drones, helicopters, and more.

Game Features

  • Online Multiplayer for up to 6v6 with objectives and creeps
  • Skill-based gameplay and risk-vs-reward equipment progression
  • Multiple generations of iconic fighters for you to collect and pilot from ranging from WWII propellers to modern multirole jets. (At least 25 are planned for the full release)
  • Start with props and upgrade your way to jets over the course of a single match
  • Huge variety of weapons and countermeasures to engage your enemies with
  • "Kill-Tree" kill-streak skill-tree to snowball your power in battle
  • Unique and vibrant art style
  • Novice / Expert control modes and Controller Support
  • Unlocked Framerate
  • Resolution independent render scaling

name: SKYRAID Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i5 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 720p and Low Graphics Setting at 30-60Hz. (SKYRAID supports resolution upscaling for further performance boosting on low end systems.)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6th Generation Intel i7 series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 1080p and High Graphics Setting at 120Hz or higher. (SKYRAID features super-resolution downsampling and an unlocked framerate for high end computers.)

short_description: Squad up with your friends in this 6 vs 6 game of aerial conquest! Pilot cute parodies of iconic war planes ranging from early props to modern multirole jets. Become the top dog leveraging a huge array of equipment to tip the scales in your favor and rule the skies!
